data.text:
The rooms are clean and big. 
The staff was very helpful and nice
The location was very good to me and near all important places. 
Also, i rented a car so the hotel has free parking which has a big space. 
House keeping was very responsive and helpful for all requests.
data.title: Great stay. Will do again for sure

data.text: Been staying at the hotel for a long time. One of the best hotels I've been at for a long. Massive thanks to the receptionist Ms. Bushra for her extremely friendly attitude and support on the long stay as well as helping with all the necessary detail with my long stay. Also, really huge appreciation for the security Mr. Hary for always helping being friendly and helping whenever I needed help. Overall, amazing service at all time.
data.title: Amazing stay

data.text:
We celebrated my wife  birthday with a stay at the amazing hotel. Where do I even begin with how out of this world our stay was,we stayed 7 days at this hotel and there is only good things to say: the room it‚Äôs clean and spacious. It has a kitchen which its very handy.
The staff are very friendly, courteous and helpful.
I would like to thank all the team! Specialy thanks to housekeeping staff person who made birthday decorations and clean our room, May, the gards that where always assinting with a smile.
The breakfest its very good! I loved the  food but in special the coffee.
Thank you chief, The swiming pool its very nice and clean.
The location is very good. The global village and outlet mall is very near.
When I travel with family all details are important and counts. And this hotel think and care about their costumers. I totaly recomend and I will stay there again in future for sure. Good friends and great memories to remember.
data.title: Great experience thank you abidos

data.text:
My family and I arrived at this Hotel Apartment on September 1st, planning to stay until September 15th. 
However, we extended our stay for another month until October 15th. 
This place is incredibly cozy and clean, and the staff are exceptionally kind, polite, helpful, and friendly. 
I'd like to express my gratitude to Mr. Hamid and Mrs. Wah Wah for their exceptional kindness and friendliness.
During our stay, my family and I had pleasant days here, and the availability of amenities like free Wi-Fi, parking, gym, and swimming pool was very important to us.
We encountered no issues with these facilities. The hotel's location is contingent on what you intend to do in Dubai, and for us, it was excellent.
and since we rented a car, we didn't face any problems with transportation. 
I believe the hotel also offers shuttle services to one or two malls. 
Additionally, the hotel is conveniently close to Silicon Mall and LuLu Market.
The only minor issues we encountered were with the TV, which was not very new. 
Since I enjoy watching series all the time, I solved this problem by using my own projector. 
Occasionally, the hood in the kitchen had intermittent issues, but I didn't file any complaints about it with the staff.
Overall, we are extremely satisfied with our stay here, and I highly recommend choosing this place.
data.title: Great Hotel Apartment, I recommend you üëå

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Pegah,   
Thank you for sharing your feedback and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with the excellent experience you deserve. 
Thank you so much for taking your precious time to write a detail report about your stay. It was our pleasure having you with us for a long stay. Thank you for complimenting Hamid Ali and Wah Wah for their exceptional service toward you. Your satisfaction and contentment are our number one goal. Once again, thank you for staying with us and leaving us this wonderful review. 
We look forward to seeing again soon. 
Warm regards, 	

Rohan Perera 
General Manager
owner_response.author: Abidos Hotels
